subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Kevin Harvick slipped past Jimmie Johnson, a five-time winner at Fontana, on the final turn to win his first race of the season.
snippet: Kevin Harvick slipped past Jimmie Johnson, a five-time winner at Fontana, on the final turn to win his first race of the season.
